column4: Is there any reasonable option to create a "Shared Documents" folder where all users on a single machine can read, write and execute. I've had real difficulties doing this.
of course.  /tmp is such a folder.
/tmp is.  What I'm saying is that you can create another folder, but using /tmp as an example.
I've tried that, but it doesn't apply permissions to files dumped into that folder at a later date. Only to existing files.
